passages.text:
Here you are, at ABC Grocery Store, because your mom asked you to grab some groceries. 

[[Go use the restroom]]
[[Go grab a cart]]
[[Go to Starbucks]]
[[Go into the store]]
passages.name: Entrance

passages.text:
You got yourself a shopping cart and entered the store. Ooooh, Starbucks! Want to go take a look and maybe order some munchies?

[[Go to Starbucks]]
[[Keep moving and grab groceries we need]]

links.name: Keep moving and grab groceries we need
links.link: Keep moving and grab groceries we need

passages.name: Go grab a cart

passages.text:
*sniff sniff* you smell that? EVERYTHING SMELLS AMAZING HERE. You want to order literally everything here but you're broke :/ What are you going to order?

[[Matcha green tea latte]]
[[Bacon egg bite]]
passages.name: Go to Starbucks

passages.text:
Wait, you're not going to just carry 2 gallons of milk, 5 packs of spaghetti, 2 pounds of rice, 3 packs of toilet paper, 2 boxes of deterg...you know what I mean. Go get yourself a cart, stupid.

[[Go grab a cart]]
passages.name: Go into the store

passages.text:
Mmmm! Delicious! Wait, why am I here?

[[Go home]]
passages.name: Matcha green tea latte

passages.text:
Mmmm! Delicious! Wait, why am I here?

[[Go home]]
passages.name: Bacon egg bite

passages.text:
You got back empty-handed and you got yelled at by your mom :(

GAME OVER
passages.name: Go home

passages.text:
You went through the shopping list your mom gave you and grabbed everything she asked for. 15 minutes later, you checked out.

[[Go home with groceries]]
passages.name: Keep moving and grab groceries we need

passages.text: You got everything your mom needed! Well done!
passages.name: Go home with groceries

passages.text:
F.I.N.A.L.L.Y. You had been holding it in for like, forever. Ahhh... you feel so much more relieved now. Let's get you some toilet pa...per?

[[THERE IS NO TOILET PAPER]]
passages.name: Go use the restroom
